Title: Hidden
Writer: Carlton Cuse (developed for television by), Kerry Ehrin (developed for television by), Anthony Cipriano (developed for television by), Torrey Speer, Robert Bloch (based on characters from the novel 'Psycho' by), Philip Buiser (executive story editor), Torrey Speer (story editor)
Actors: Vera Farmiga, Freddie Highmore, Max Thieriot, Olivia Cooke
Plot: Norman learns who he can rely on as he attempts to protect his secrets; Romero struggles to find safety.
